API#

dictionary_tools.structure.DictionaryParser([...])

This is a class for parsing a dictionary and returning a string of its dictionary_tools which can be printed for a convenient way of understanding any nested dictionary_tools and the types used # todo option to display actual keys # todo check or DefaultDict, OrderedDict - other data structures

dictionary_tools.data_models.CommentedKey(key)

This is a pydantic dataclass for validating data to be used a dictionary key with a comment

dictionary_tools.data_models.CommentedValue(value)

This is a pydantic dataclass for validating data to be used a dictionary value with a comment

dictionary_tools.data_models.d_keys(d[, ...])

A class used for extracting dictionary keys from CommentedDict

dictionary_tools.CommentedDict.CommentedDict(...)

Subclass of UserDict with addtional 'comment' attribute
